Author: Moderator
Message: Welcome JustAFox.

Author: Moderator
Message: Thank you for participating in this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: If you can see this, please type "Yes"

Author: JustAFox
Message: Yes

Author: Moderator
Message: In the next posts, I'll be going over the rules of the "game" you're about to play.

Author: Moderator
Message: Once I'll be done, I'll ask you if you've understood the rules, and if you haven't I'll explain them in different words.

Author: JustAFox
Message: Okay. Go ahead.

Author: Moderator
Message: You're about to talk to Andrew. Andrew is a fictive character that has been completely created for the purpose of this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: You'll be talking to him twice.

Author: Moderator
Message: The only difference between the two conversations you'll have with him, is that in one of them Andrew will be played by a real human.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the other, it will be played by an Artificial Intelligence we are developing.

Author: Moderator
Message: We will call the Human and the Artificial Intelligence the Actors.

Author: Moderator
Message: The order in which you'll be talking to each Actor is random.

Author: Moderator
Message: You will not be talking twice with the same Actor.

Author: Moderator
Message: Both the Artificial Intelligence and the Human will try to portray the same Andrew in the most convincing way they can.

Author: Moderator
Message: Your goal is simple. After talking to the two actors, you'll have to guess which one was the Artificial Intelligence and which one was the Human.

Author: Moderator
Message: Whenever you have made your decision, you are able to stop the conversation.

Author: Moderator
Message: Each conversation will last for 15 minutes maximum if you do not decide to stop it before.

Author: Moderator
Message: Please, keep your posts to text only (No smileys, no links... etc)

Author: Moderator
Message: Do not type more than one post per answer.

Author: Moderator
Message: Do you understand the rules and what you have to do?

Author: JustAFox
Message: Yes

Author: Moderator
Message: Good. Andrew will start the conversation. The 15 minutes will start after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: JustAFox
Message: Yes

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: JustAFox
Message: Hello there my friend. How was your day, what did you to today?

Author: Andrew
Message: It's been quite alright thank you! Played a couple of games and stuff. What about you?

Author: JustAFox
Message: Hmm, what kind of games did you play and why did you prefer to stay inside when there's 20 degress outside with an all blue sky? I went  to work since it's Tuesday.

Author: Andrew
Message: Well, I don't have much to do outside to be honest right now. I've been so busy that I try to relax. I've been playing Mass Effect mostly.

Author: JustAFox
Message: Not having spring feelings? Come one. All blue sky and hot temperatures? Isn't that inviting?

Author: Andrew
Message: Well, here in Canada it's not that hot. Where do you live?

Author: JustAFox
Message: would  you like to guess where I live?

Author: Andrew
Message: I can try.

Author: JustAFox
Message: I give you a hint: the wall.

Author: Andrew
Message: Trump's wall?

Author: JustAFox
Message: Next hint: more that 20 years ago

Author: Andrew
Message: I don't really know.

Author: JustAFox
Message: Do you want another hint?

Author: Andrew
Message: Sure yes.

Author: JustAFox
Message: There was something called american sector.

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh yeah?

Author: JustAFox
Message: Yes. There was also a russian and an french sector

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh yeah. You're talking about Berlin right?

Author: JustAFox
Message: Right. What was the hint that made you recognise it?

Author: Andrew
Message: The last one I guess.

Author: JustAFox
Message: Do you have access to google?

Author: Andrew
Message: Not right now no.

Author: JustAFox
Message: Do you have a specific piece of history you enjoy?

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to (This is not your final answer)

Author: JustAFox
Message: I think you're the AI. In case you're not, plese don't feel offended.I guess the real actor would have at least known about the wall and such much quicker.

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright. We'll start the next conversation. Andrew will begin and then you'll have 15 minutes after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: JustAFox
Message: Yes

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: JustAFox
Message: Hello there buddy. How was the weather today?

Author: Andrew
Message: It was decent I guess. A rather good day for Ontario to be honest.

Author: JustAFox
Message: Was it sunny or just less cold?

Author: Andrew
Message: It was sunny actually. About 59° too.

Author: JustAFox
Message: You're talking about fahrenheit, I guess?

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh yeah sorry. I'm not sure how much that is in celsius. Something like 10?

Author: JustAFox
Message: Can you convert that from Fahrenheit to Celsius for me?

Author: Andrew
Message: I think I just did. I'm not sure about the exact formula though.

Author: JustAFox
Message: There comes something else to my mind. It's about this conversation. May I suggest another hint for the rules?

Author: Andrew
Message: What do you mean?

Author: JustAFox
Message: Do you know about a character limit regarding the char input window?

Author: Andrew
Message: I know there is one. I'm not sure how many that is.

Author: JustAFox
Message: It'd come handy to know about beforehand.

Author: Andrew
Message: Ah ok.

Author: JustAFox
Message: You know, it's a tad annoying to have something great in mind and not being able to elaborate on it.

Author: Andrew
Message: You can't make it shorter?

Author: JustAFox
Message: I had to. Was no fun.

Author: Andrew
Message: I believe it's to make sure people don't write a book or something like that.

Author: JustAFox
Message: isn't that a bit unpolite?

Author: Andrew
Message: Why would it be?

Author: JustAFox
Message: How'd you feel about not being able to express yourself?

Author: Andrew
Message: I've heard someone say constraints trigger creativity.

Author: JustAFox
Message: Only if the outcome is worth the effort.

Author: Andrew
Message: Well, what was your idea about?

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: JustAFox
Message: About explaining how my day was. Something awesome happened where I was today for most of the time.

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to in the first conversation?

Author: JustAFox
